remarks: Atom exchange property.  Version of ~ hlatexch2 with less-than ordering.  (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2012.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
atexchlt.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
atexchlt.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
atexchlt.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
atexchltN $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ ( P e. A /\ Q e. A /\ R e. A ) /\ P =/= R ) -> ( P .< ( Q .\/ R ) -> Q .< ( P .\/ R ) ) ) $.
